body.name: AZDOME M17 WiFi Dash Cam, FHD 1080P Car Driving Recorder, 3" Screen Dashboard Camera 150° Wide Angle, Smart Dash Camera with Driving Assistant ADAS, G-Sensor Loop Recording Night Vision Parking Mode
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 1 hr 5 mins
features: Built-in WiFi: User could connect car WiFi driving recorder to 'AZDOME App' on iOS or Android devices. WiFi dash camera could support video playback, download and management. User could share travel landscapes and moment with friends and family.
FHD 1080P Dash Cam: Front dash cam M17 records FHD 1920x1080P/30 fps video. Dashcam could clearly captures license plates as well as road signs.
150° Wide Angle: Wide-angle lens allows for an extensive field of view. Wider perspective minimizes blind spots and increases the chances of capturing important details.

ADAS Collision Avoidance: Advanced Driver Assistance Systems could improve driving safety by providing real-time assistance and warnings. Including 2 ADAS alerts: Forward collision and lane departure.

G Sensor Loop Recording: AZDOME M17 dashcam will lock emergency video in the event of a collision. Car security camera automatically overwrites old unlocked video when the memory card is full. Both G-sensor and loop recording function prevent important files from being overwritten.

Super Night Vision: With F1.8 large aperture and 6-glass wide angle lens, M17 dash cam uses professional-level Full HD GC2053 CMOS image sensor with the Mstar 8336 chip to capture finest details even at night.

24 Hours Parking Monitor: Front dash cam automatically records important events when detects impact. 24H parking mode allows user to have peace of mind after getting out of the vehicle. Please purchase an additional hardwire kit for parking mode (search ASIN: B096G6FKZP).

Warranty: AZDOME M17 provides 12 months warranty and 24*7 technical supports. Please email us when you facing to any problems with aftersales service. AZDOME R&D team will try our best to feedback within 24 hours working days.
body.description: AZDOME - The brand you can trust Everything we make is to ensure your safety driving. This device features a 150° wide-angle camera and an advanced sensor with FHD 1080P resolution for recording day and night. It captures crystal-clear, Full-HD video of your entire drive with its super-wide-angle lens. Additionally, it has loop recording capabilities that allow you to choose between 1/2/3 minute loops that will be stored on the SD card. When the memory capacity is full, old videos are automatically overwritten. Built‒In WiFi With Free AZDOME App 3 inch IPS Screen 1080P Clearer Video Emergency Recording（Built-in 3-Axis Impact G‒Sensor) 6-Glass Wide Angle Lens - Superior Night Vision High Temperature Resistance Sticky Mount 24-Hour Parking Monitor (Need additional Hardwire Kit) FREE Firmware Upgrade and APP Update

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1080P Car Dash Camera Built-in WiFi Feature With the AZDOME APP The AZDOME M17 car camera boasts advanced features, including a high definition lens that provides detailed recordings, such as capturing number plates of other vehicles. Additionally, the loop recording feature ensures old files are replaced by new ones without taking up memory space. The G-sensor system locks specific files or data for added security and peace of mind. With its built-in WiFi feature and free AZDOME app, users can easily access their videos on their iPhone or Android phone while on the road. Warm Tips: 1. The packaging does not include a memory card; you will need to purchase a Class 10 U3 Speed SD Card with a maximum support of 128GB. Avoid fake memory cards and format your SD card with your dash cam before first use. Search ASIN: B09K78CNM8 2. Use external power while using the dash cam since the battery is mainly used for emergency file saving purposes only. Parking Monitor requires continuous power and an AZDOME JYX02 3-lead Mini USB Hardwire Kit (not included in packaging). Search ASIN: B096G6FKZP 3. If you want to install the front camera on your car's rearview mirror, consider purchasing our Mirror Mount Holder (not included in packaging). Search ASIN: B09J58VZ6Z 4. Although loop recording is set up, it's recommended that you format your SD card every four weeks for smoother operation. 5. We provide updates for dash cam firmware and accessories. 6. Our team strives to improve our products continually - please share any constructive suggestions with us at any time!

AZDOME specializes in providing smart car electronics & visual perceptual solution for car-lovers. PACKAGE CONTENTS AZDOME M17 Dash Cam x 1 Car Charger (3.5m/12ft) x 1 Sticky Mounting Tape x 1 Electrostatic Film for Sticky Mount x 1 Car Wiring Trim Tool x 1 Cable Hiding Clips x 5 User Manual x 1 AZDOME - The brand you can trust Everything we make is to ensure your safety driving. This device features a 150° wide-angle camera and an advanced sensor with FHD 1080P resolution for recording day and night. It captures crystal-clear, Full-HD video of your entire drive with its super-wide-angle lens. Additionally, it has loop recording capabilities that allow you to choose between 1/2/3 minute loops that will be stored on the SD card. When the memory capacity is full, old videos are automatically overwritten. Built‒In WiFi With Free AZDOME App 3 inch IPS Screen 1080P Clearer Video Emergency Recording（Built-in 3-Axis Impact G‒Sensor) 6-Glass Wide Angle Lens - Superior Night Vision High Temperature Resistance Sticky Mount 24-Hour Parking Monitor (Need additional Hardwire Kit) FREE Firmware Upgrade and APP Update

Excellent Full HD Video Quality The AZDOME M17 is equipped with a high-end video processor that can record at 30 frames per second in 1080P resolution. This feature allows for the capture of detailed evidence in case of accidents or to prevent insurance fraud. Ideal for Any Climate The AZDOME M17 Dash Cam is constructed with premium ABS materials and features high temperature resistant mounting tape. It can operate effectively in extreme temperatures ranging from -4°F to 158°F, ensuring it remains securely attached to the windshield regardless of whether you're driving through the winter in Alaska or the summer heat of Texas. One Press to Save Emergency Locked Evidence Besides automatically locking important recordings during collisions, you can also manually save memorable moments or record instances of road rage to protect your rights.

Built‒In WiFi With Free AZDOME App The AZDOME APP allows you to: - Live stream video within 10 feet of the camera. - Access previously recorded videos and download them. - Watch videos while tracking your location on Google Maps. - Share videos with friends and family on various social media platforms such as YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Pinterest, TikTok, and more. - Adjust settings conveniently through the AZDOME App. ADAS (Advanced Driver Assitance Systems) The system detects road line markings and alerts the driver if they unintentionally depart from their lane. If there is a risk of collision, an alarm sounds and a visual alert is displayed. However, it's important to note that ADAS may not function properly in bad weather or poor road conditions. Additionally, while the ADAS system can improve safety, it has limitations and cannot prevent all accidents. Therefore, drivers should always exercise caution when driving. Super Night Vision With the F1.8 Large Aperture and 6-Glass Wide Angle Lens, M17 dash cam uses the professional-level Full HD GC2053 CMOS image sensor with the Mstar 8336 chip to capture finest details even at night.

Adjustable Lens & Broader Field of View This lens allows you to adjust the front view angle, making it perfect for driving on wide highways or large intersections. It eliminates the fish-eye effect that can make vehicles in front appear further away and ensures that no moment is missed. Parking Monitor Anti-thief Parking Monitor works on an internal battery. If someone hits your car and impact reaches the G-Sensor Level, then the camera will turn ON and record 1-min video, then LOCKS IT & SAVES IT. Note: Long time parking function needs a Mini Hardwire Kit (NOT included in the box) Time-Lapse Video A Time-Lapse Video captures images at a lower rate, allowing you to select specific frames per second. When played back at the normal rate, the video appears to be moving faster in time lapse. By enabling this feature, your camera will take video frames at set intervals and create a condensed time-lapse video.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality and clear picture
reviews.reviewText: The dashcam really has high quality and clear picture, it covers wide range side to side, and the 24 hour parking recording is fanatastic. i might say we won't find any other high quality dashcam at this price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wanted to wait a bit after buying to review. Bought this one for myself and a different one for my brother, this one is really nice. The memory is great, the picture quality during the day AND night is very clear. I recommend everyone get a dash cam ESPECIALLY since it lowers your insurance!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great camera, but died after 2.5 years
reviews.reviewText: This camera has been wonderful. Great quality. Even saved my butt during a hit and run/getting a gun pulled on me. I'm sad it won't turn back on now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Changing my review
reviews.reviewText: I initially gave this 5 stars as it checked all the boxes I needed it to. I was previously using Magellan, Garmin and a Viofo over the years and the viofo was way too complicated requiring formatting to fat32 which I couldn't ever figure out, and the fact it never recorded when I needed it to, so I got this one. WELL it was great having an easy to use dashcam and the peace of mind knowing it would be a witness when needed, well thats until the POS doesn't work. I was involved in an incident today when a box truck blew a red light without warning and almost killed me. Told the troopers that I have it all on dashcam. So I go to review it and what do you know, it recorded all 83 minutes of my 90 minute commute this morning EXCEPT the 7 minutes I actually needed. To add insult to injury it even recorded me taking it off the windshield to play back the video 🙄. What use is a dashcam when it doesn't do its job? I've bought 4 of them to put in our personal cars and 7 for our company, I will be replacing them immediately. Don't rely on this garbage

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for price.
reviews.reviewText: The cam worked great, the video quality was good also. Unfortunately I had to return it, because I thought it came with an SD card, it did not. I bought one which I didn't mind. When I inserted the card an error came up saying it was the worn card. Also within seconds of inserting the card bot the card and cam become hot. The card was way to hot. I gave it a 5 start because the problem was not the cam but the card, and I can't use the cam without the card. I will have to buy a cam that comes with a card.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Easy installationOnly connects to phone with wifi when the phone is close by but internet on phone does not work while connected

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent camera at a budget price
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Took a bit to figure things out, and that is coming from a senior lady, that gets easily frustrated. I did read other reviews, because those are usually quite helpful, with extra tips. You do have to turn your mobile data off, to connect to the camera. Not really a big deal, but it won't work if you miss that step. To connect the app to the camera to see videos, you have to be within 10 ft of the camera, so to download, you'd probably have to be in the car, with the car running, so there is power to the camera. Downloads take a bit, so patience is needed. A long video would probably take quite a while, but I haven't tested that yet. The daytime video quality is excellent, in my lowly opinion. Nighttime driving is rare for me, but I will update as I figure the camera out more. See the video, and judge the quality for yourself. Will be back soon with updates.Second update with a night time video. My windshield was a bit wet as you can see in the video, but the video quality at night is fine.Currently on sale for 50% off. I bought a decent mini SD card from Amazon, and didn't have any problems formatting it. 08092023

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very flawlessly!
reviews.reviewText: I worked as a delivery driver and this dashcam works like magic! As soon as I turned on my car it starts recording and the loop just go on. The night vision is very clear. I just wish the company would include multiple plastic tape because in Florida it's very hot and the stickiness doesn't really last when it's hot. Worth the money! 😊
